# GitHub Copilot Instructions

## Project Context
This is a monorepo containing text processing tools.

## Code Style Preferences
- Use TypeScript for all new code
- Follow Vue 3 Composition API patterns
- Use Polish language for comments and documentation
- Prefer const over let when variables don't change
- Use arrow functions for callbacks

## Project Structure
- `src/texttool/` - Vue 3 + Vite application for text processing
- `docs/` - Files for publishing app on GitHub Pages
## Conventions
- Component files should use PascalCase
- Utility functions should be well-typed
- Keep components focused and single-purpose
- Use Vite's fast refresh capabilities

## Testing
- Write unit tests for utility functions
- Test edge cases and error handling

## Documentation
- Document complex logic in Polish
- Keep README files up to date
